description: Documentation for building the frontend on Railway with the required Vite build args.

required.name: VITE_API_HTTP_URL
required.description: Public HTTP base URL of the backend service. Example: https://<your-backend>.railway.app

required.name: VITE_API_WS_URL
required.description: Public WebSocket base URL of the backend service. Example: wss://<your-backend>.railway.app

optional.name: VITE_SERVER_TIMEZONE
optional.description: Timezone label used by the UI.

runtime.PORT: Managed by Railway; the Dockerfile binds to ${PORT}.

railwayUIInstructions: Create a new service from this repo and choose Dockerfile build.
Open Variables and add Build Args: VITE_API_HTTP_URL, VITE_API_WS_URL (and optional VITE_SERVER_TIMEZONE).
Deploy. Any change to VITE_* requires a rebuild.

examples.dockerBuildLocally: docker build -f promtok_frontend/Dockerfile --build-arg VITE_API_HTTP_URL=https://<backend> --build-arg VITE_API_WS_URL=wss://<backend> -t promtok-frontend ./

notes: Vite reads VITE_* at build time. Changing these values after deploy requires triggering a new build.
